verses.text: Ach in Diosal, colin icha ajnac alan t'ayin. Colin yujto syal uuj smasanil.
Ach in Diosal, ab' in lesal tik. Ak'cot tz'eyan a chiquin t'a tas svala'.
Yujto a eb' anima manh vojtacoc tz'och ajk'olal t'ayin, aton eb' comonnhej tz'ak'an chucal t'a yetanimail. Sgana eb' to tzin chami. Malaj elk'och t'a eb'.
Palta jun, tik val a ach ayachoch ved'oc. Tik val uuj pitzan in.
Ha schucal eb' ayoch ajk'olal chi' t'ayin ol meltzajoch t'a yib'anh uuj. Mamin, satcanel eb' yujto tzak'nhejelk'och tas tzala'.
Mamin Jehov√°, ol vak' in silab' t'ayach t'a yol vico', ol ach in b'itani yujto wach' ach,
yujto ix in a colel t'a smasanil vilk'olal. Ix vilan skan eb' ajk'ool t'ayin t'a yalanh uuj.
